summary: When the murdered body discovered by beautiful, vivacious socialite Melsa Manton disappears, police and press label her a prankster until she proves them wrong.
cast: Barbara Stanwyck|Henry Fonda|Sam Levene|Frances Mercer|Stanley Ridges|Whitney Bourne|Vickie Lester|Ann Evers|Catherine O'Quinn|Linda Perry|Eleanor Hansen|Hattie McDaniel|James Burke|Paul Guilfoyle|Penny Singleton|Leona Maricle|Kay Sutton|Miles Mander|John Qualen|Grady Sutton|Olin Howland|Frank Anthony|Irving Bacon|Harry A. title: Ocho mujeres y un crimen
